ingredients.item: essential Waitrose British Chicken Breast Fillets, diced, about 500g
350g tub essential Waitrose Tomato And Basil Sauce
40g essential Waitrose Pitted Green Olives, sliced
25g pack Waitrose Cooks’ Ingredients Basil, shredded

instructions.step: Preheat the oven to 200°C, gas mark 6.
Place the chicken in an ovenproof dish. Mix together the stock, tomato and basil sauce and olives, and pour over the chicken. Bake for 30 minutes.
Meanwhile, cook the tagliatelle in boiling water for 4 minutes. Drain and return to the pan. Stir in the basil, chicken and the sauce, and mix to coat evenly.
